title: The Lightning's Whisper
story: A deafening peal of thunder echoes, and for a fleeting moment, the castle's ancient stones seem to hum with a dark energy, revealing a path yet demanding a toll.
effect: All heroes may immediately move up to 2 rooms as a free action (this movement does not use an action). However, the raw electrical discharge rattles your very spirit. All heroes lose 1 Sanity and 1 Willpower.
